setup: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS visit;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS hospital;
CREATE TABLE hospital (id INT, name VARCHAR(100), district VARCHAR(100), state VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE visit (id INT, patient_id INT, hospital_id INT, visit_date DATE);
INSERT INTO hospital VALUES (1, 'Patna General', 'Patna', 'Bihar'), (2, 'Aurangabad Care', 'Aurangabad', 'Bihar'), (3, 'Ranchi Trauma', 'Ranchi', 'Jharkhand');
query: SELECT h.name, COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM visit v JOIN hospital h ON v.hospital_id = h.id WHERE h.state = 'Bihar' GROUP BY h.name ORDER BY total_visits DESC LIMIT 1;

setup: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS visit;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS hospital;
CREATE TABLE hospital (id INT, name VARCHAR(100), district VARCHAR(100), state VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE visit (id INT, patient_id INT, hospital_id INT, visit_date DATE);
INSERT INTO hospital VALUES (1, 'Patna Clinic', 'Patna', 'Bihar'), (2, 'Muzaffarpur Health', 'Muzaffarpur', 'Bihar'), (3, 'Dhanbad General', 'Dhanbad', 'Jharkhand');

query: SELECT h.name, COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM visit v JOIN hospital h ON v.hospital_id = h.id WHERE h.state = 'Bihar' GROUP BY h.name ORDER BY total_visits DESC LIMIT 1;
